parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Return an array with the vehicle's all pylons info.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[<template><title>PAGENAMEE</title></template>]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Array]]s in format [Pylon index, Pylon name, Assigned turret, Magazine className, Magazine ammo count, [[currentMagazineDetail|Magazine detail]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getAllPylonsInfo]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/*
	Executed on an Mi-48 Kajman:
	[
		[1,"PylonLeft1",[0],"PylonRack_4Rnd_LG_scalpel",4,"0:10000646"],
		[2,"PylonLeft2",[0],"PylonRack_19Rnd_Rocket_Skyfire",19,"0:10000648"],
		[3,"PylonRight2",[0],"PylonRack_19Rnd_Rocket_Skyfire",19,"0:10000649"],
		[4,"PylonRight1",[0],"PylonRack_4Rnd_LG_scalpel",4,"0:10000650"]
	]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>/</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ammoOnPylon]] [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] [[getPylonMagazines]] [[setAmmoOnPylon]] [[setPylonLoadout]] [[setPylonsPriority]]
</value></part></template></root>
